tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I recently underwent successful ACL and PCL surgery performed by Dr. Praveen Tittal, and I am more satisfied with the entire experience.
Overall, my experience with Dr. Praveen Tittal has been outstanding. I highly recommend him to anyone in need of ACL and PCL surgery. His skill, professionalism, and compassionate care have made a significant difference in my life. Thank you, Dr. Praveen Tittl, for giving me the ability to regain my mobility and quality of life!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Praveen Tittal, is an amazing Orthopaedic doctor I met. I underwent ACL reconstruction surgery on 21st march 2024 under his supervision. He understands the problem and provided the best treatment. I got operated and almost recovered in almost 40 days. He made sure i can have the best guidance and support. He planned weekly visits post surgery and under his supervision made me walk again. I am really thankful to you doctor.

review: *** ******* ******* *** ** *** **** ***** **** I got treated for ACL reconstruction and had the best experience. He is humble and best in his field. With his expertise and best class treatment I got operated and recovered in 45 days. I am really thankful to you doc.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
ACL reconstruction done by Dr Praveen tittal on 17 oct 2023...
It's been 6 months completed...almost 95% recovery done
All of the exercises done as advised by Praveen sir and now I am completely comfortable with my operated knee....back with  my daily living activities with day by day improvements.....*** ** *** ** *** **** ***** ****** ***************

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Praveen is expert in sports injuries and has been a real savior multiple times for me.
My mother accident fell and had an elbow fracture with a deep cut. Dr Praveen ensured smooth surgical process and wired reconstruction of elbow for my mother.in few weeks she has been able to get back to normal routine.

Similarly my wife's sister fell from stairs and has knee ligament tear but Dr Praveen ensured careful examination and suggested excercise and rotations of leg to help recover faster.
He is **** ************** experienced in these accidental injuries and does help with complete understanding of the problem and provides effective solution.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Parveen Tittal is the most compassionate and caring doctor I have ever seen. In an accident I tear my ACL and doctor performed surgery on 22nd of April 2022. After 3 month of rehabilitation with his great guidance today I‚Äôm able perform all the physical activities like  walk, drive, gym & swimming. I highly recommend to all people out there with sports injuries you guys must visit him. He is gem of a person and truly blessing for his patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: D. Tittal treated me for persistent knee pain , mobility issues through Arthroscopic ACL reconstruction at Fortis Gurgaon . His diagnosis, explanation and treatment have been excellent so far and I have improved my knee mobility quite a lot. Highly  Recommend .

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: My kneecap fracture was in very dangerous condition. When I meet the doctor, he give me Full satisfaction with their treatment. Today my kneecap and my leg was in good condition I walk properly and do all the activities.

tags: Wait time,
review: We have been waiting for the doctor for an hour now, but he is not available in the clinic. the staff has no clue about when he would be back.

tags: None
review: I already had taken treatment from him for knee issues and the experience was amazing so visited again for the another issue. Detailed explanation given by him gave great relief to me as have been going through the issues since couple of months.. sometimes medicine won't work but the briefing does.. amazing experience I had and would definitely recommend to everyone who so ever is suffering from any ortho related issues, should visit him once

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was really a very great experience with Orthopaedics & Sports Injury Clinic. The doctor really take care of each and every aspect of the patient and make a detailed enquiry for each improvement.  I had also joined this clinic 2 months back for my back and joint pain  and within a period of 2.5 months i had made a great improvement..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Parveen Tittal is very good and expert orthopedic surgeon. I had an accident in which my left shoulder was injured. He did surgery of my shoulder. Now I am absolutely fit and fine. I felt good that i met him for my surgery.
